name: Fundación AITIIP
goal:
AITIIP aims to promote business and cultural development within the plastics processing industry mainly by contributing to the generation of technological knowledge and its application to the development and strengthening of the enterprises competitiveness in the field of technology and innovation. Two areas are distinguished:
Business Area:
 Endorse the development of an enabling environment for business development in the plastics sector and tooling industry.
 To promote activities that contribute to the development of a new corporate culture and improving the enterprises competitiveness.
 Develop technological activities that promote an improved industrial sector and in particular for Aragonese companies.
 Encourage and promote entrepreneurship aimed at developing research, quality, and new technologies that will improve the quality of the environment in which they develop.

Socio-cultural area:
 Support the development, research, innovation, technology and expertise to contribute to the improvement of training and development of corporate culture.
 Promote and develop high quality research activities in the areas of Foundation activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
